translations: v．再融资：指重新安排或替换现有的债务，通常是为了获得更优惠的贷款条件。
· The company refinances its debt to take advantage of lower interest rates.
公司进行再融资以利用较低的利率。

sentences.sentence: The unit also refinances mortgages and makes home-equity loans.
sentences.translation: 该部门也再融资抵押贷款和家庭资产贷款。

sentences.sentence: If one refinances in the future, he will have to pay off the 2nd mortgage.
sentences.translation: 如果为了获得一个在未来，他将付出过第二按揭。

sentences.sentence: It would in any case unfold gradually as Rome refinances its debt over time.
sentences.translation: 不管怎样，它会随着罗马逐步地为其债务进行再融资而逐步展开。
